data.name: Approximately equal
data.description:
Task

Define a function `approximately_equal` to return whether the first parameter is ___approximately equal___ to the second parameter, In other words, whether the difference between parameter 1 and parameter 2 is within a certain range.

Examples

```python approximately_equal(10, 11, range=3) = True approximately_equal(-3, -5, range=3) = True approximately_equal(12, 15, range=2) = False approximately_equal(-10, 10, range=20) = True approximately_equal(-10, 10, range=19) = False approximately_equal(-10, 30, range=0) = False ```

Notes

+ Parameter `range` is always greater than 0 + Test scope: ___-10000 <= p1, p2 <= 10000; 0 <= range <= 50000___
